post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
The question could have been more specific.

If you are interested in participating at a seminar (as the subject indicates), we are currently planning for 2003 education events. We could open a web site development course if there are enough interests.

If you want to teach web site development skills, we are also looking for potential lecturers as well.

If you are a web developer and looking for a web developers' group (as the content indicates), we have a web team that developed this web site.

But still I am not sure what 'web related' means. I just assumed it would be 'web site development' but I may be wrong.


>
>>안녕하세요.
>>web site development 에 관련된 모임이 있는지 궁금하네요. 연락주시면 감사하겠습니다
>
post.title: [re] web related seminar
